# STATS::PLAYSTATS_ODDJOB_DONE

## Summary
Metric set when an oddjob is completed

## Parameters
* **INT** timeSpent: Time spent in odd job.
* **INT** oddJobId: Odd job identifier - can be the mini-game enum value.
* **INT** extraOddJobId = 0:
Default value is 0.
Set only to distinguish different Locations of the mini-game.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This native does absolutely nothing, just a nullsub
